mapper.select: select m.material_number ,m.material_name ,m.unit ,o.count ,m.sale_Unitprice ,s.phone ,s.store_name ,sysdate AS today ,s.email from order_cart o join material m on m.material_number = o.material_number join store s on o.store_number = s.store_number where o.store_number = #{storeNumber} ORDER by m.material_number
mapper.insert: Insert INTO Order_details( Order_details_number ,count ,Order_Number ,MATERIAL_NUMBER) values ( 'FDO' || LPAD(FDO_SEQ.nextval,'7',0) ,#{count} ,#{orderNumber} ,#{materialNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( select s.order_number ,s.order_day ,s.cancel_operation ,s.order_name ,p.name ,p.email ,p.phone ,s.allprice ,s.oder_App from store_order s LEFT OUTER join person p on s.person_id = p.person_id where auto_order_operation = 'i1' AND store_number=#{storeNumber} ORDER by s.order_number DESC ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
